title: Why do you think female traveler numbers from developed countries increasing when India is increasingly not safe for women?
comments:
I mean India is still a different world from rest of west, and with current environment Indian culture ka prachar bhi jyada ho raha and Indians khud net pe kafi proactive hote hai to showcases their achievements and when someone talks about us

And one must not forget that people have all kinds of experience and net has small sample size . I hear all kinds of experiences. Some hate being here , some love it for some it's somewhere in between so....
Influencers shit and its cheaper for people from developed countries to holiday in India.
It can be safe if you avoid shitty neighborhoods. Only problem is people need to stop taking selfies with foreigners
